name: KRANT
description:
/!\ Use full screen or download the windows version for a better experience /!\

KRANT ! (Keep Reading And Nobody Tchernobyl)

It's a fusion between survival and puzzle game, try to maintain the stability of the reactor by reading the manual and figuring out what to do with those colorful blinking lights around you !

Delay the inevitable for as long as possible, in you we trust !
